amendment.description: Amendment requires Federal agencies to comply with the requirements in public law and an Executive Order that deal with instituting energy efficiency improvements in Federal buildings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act from being used in contravention of the Federal buildings performance and reporting requirements of Executive Order 13123, part 3 of title V of the National Energy Conservation Policy Act of 2005 (including the amendments made thereby).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Visclosky.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
